Sentece: In addition, the t1/2 of the active moiety was prolonged (19 h in young subjects versus about 25 h in elderly and renal disease patients).
Title: Influence of age, renal and liver impairment on the pharmacokinetics of risperidone in man.
Name: Thiethylperazine
